1508340.name: Forsaken Universe
1508340.description:
Forsaken Universe is a space-exploration-survival game based on a unique universe. Become one of the elite space explorers in the universe by completing missions, building a solid base, killing space pirates and or aliens, and many other ways.

The Universe

After the black hole was discovered, it was only a matter of time before it destroyed the Milky Way. With the research, those who left early enough could inhabit new planets in different solar systems. Explore these planets and help out those in need.

Humanoid Robots

Humanoid Robots are just humans but robots! These H'Rs are your everything! From being doctors to miners, pilots, and security, to so much more, these H'Rs are found everywhere and so are you! Customize your character by unlocking different and unique Humanoid Robots and colors!

The Ships

With the universe being so big, having a ship is a must! From smaller fighter ships to capital-class ships, use your ship to travel to different planets for missions, resources, or vendors. Buy different ships and ship upgrades and colors all around the universe!

Warning!


Forsaken Universe contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised!
1508340.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
